title: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba
fullTitle: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba (TV Series 2019â€“ )

episodes.title: Someone's Dream
episodes.plot: All the Upper Rank Demons assemble at the Infinity Castle after Upper Six Demons' defeat. Meanwhile, Tanjiro heads to the Swordsmith Village.

episodes.title: Yoriichi Type Zero
episodes.plot: When Tanjiro, who heard about the existence of a secret weapon from Mitsuri, was exploring the mountains, he stumbles upon Muichiro and a boy of the village arguing over something.

episodes.title: A Sword from Over 300 Years Ago
episodes.plot: With Kotetsu's guidance and training, Tanjiro learns a new ability to understand Yoriichi Type Zero's next movements. During the training, the mechanical doll is broken by Tanjiro revealing a sword from more than 300 years ago.

episodes.title: Thank You, Tokito
episodes.plot: Hantengu's head is slashed by Muichiro and he splits into two clones. Muichiro is blown away by Karaku. Tanjiro, Nezuko and Genya are stunned when the clones split into more clones. Muichiro rescues Kotetsu from a Goldfish Demon.

episodes.title: Bright Red Sword
episodes.plot: When a group of Goldfish Demons attacks the Swordsmith Village, Mitsuri's crow informs her about the attack. Mitsuri heads to the rescue of the village.

episodes.title: Aren't You Going to Become A Hashira?
episodes.plot: After beheading three clones, Tanjiro stumbles upon Genya who has beheaded Aizetsu but has now changed in appearance. Genya recalls his past.

episodes.title: Awful Villain
episodes.plot: Genya entrusts Tanjiro with the task of beheading Hantengu. Tanjiro swings his sword at the fleeing demon but an unknown demonic entity emerges behind him.

episodes.title: The Mu in Muichiro
episodes.plot: Muichiro, with the help of air blown by Kotetsu to him, escapes Gyokko's Water Prison Pot. Muichiro finally recalls his tragic past.

episodes.title: Mist Hashira Muichiro Tokito
episodes.plot: Muichiro faces off against Gyokko once again with a new Nichirin sword he received from Kanamori.

episodes.title: Love Hashira Mitsuri Kanroji
episodes.plot: As the battle with Zohakuten intensifies, Mitsuri also develops a demon slayer mark on her neck. Just like Mucihiro, the power she gains as a result is tremendous, and she's able to overpower Zohakuten for a while.
